title: Analyze YouTube comments sentiment & keywords with Gemini AI and Telegram reporting
description:
# YouTube Comment Sentiment & Keyword Extractor

**Template Google Sheets:** [Click here to open](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1LBlCLH8L-eooAlfGq66_cLTbxyCse83c1VZaea0tjMg/edit?usp=sharing)

This workflow automatically retrieves comments from YouTube videos listed in Google Sheets, analyzes sentiment and keywords using an LLM, stores the results, then generates an aggregate summary and sends a report to Telegram.

---

## ‚ú® Key Features
- **Automated Scheduling** ‚Äì Runs the process at regular intervals.
- **Google Sheets Integration** ‚Äì Fetches a list of videos and stores analysis results directly in Google Sheets.
- **YouTube Comment Retrieval** ‚Äì Retrieves top-level comments (up to 100 per video; can be extended with pagination).
- **Comment Parsing** ‚Äì Flattens the API response into one item per comment.
- **AI Sentiment & Keyword Analysis** ‚Äì Powered by an LLM model to extract:
  - Sentiment (`positive`, `neutral`, `negative`)
  - Sentiment score (-1 to 1)
  - Keywords (cleaned from stopwords, emojis, hashtags)
  - Language (ISO 639-1, 2-letter code)
- **Data Normalization** ‚Äì Ensures LLM output is consistent and safe to write to the sheet.
- **Telegram Reporting** ‚Äì Sends a concise report for each video directly to a Telegram chat.

---

## üîê Required Credentials
- **Google Sheets OAuth2 API** ‚Äì Read & write access to the spreadsheet.
- **YouTube Data API Key** ‚Äì To fetch comments via `commentThreads`.
- **OpenRouter API Key** ‚Äì To access the LLM model.
- **Telegram Bot API** ‚Äì To send reports via a Telegram bot.

---

## üéÅ Benefits
- **End-to-End Automation** ‚Äì From comment retrieval to reporting, no manual steps required.
- **No Duplication** ‚Äì Each comment is uniquely tracked by `comment_id`.
- **Data Transparency** ‚Äì Raw and analyzed data stored neatly in Google Sheets.
- **Actionable Insights** ‚Äì Sentiment and keyword summaries ready for content strategy decisions.
- **Scalable** ‚Äì Can be extended for pagination, reply comment analysis, or additional metrics.
- **Cross-Platform** ‚Äì Direct Telegram integration for easy monitoring on any device.
